english.segment1: I never thought of what I could be. Where I'd go. What I'd do. I never thought of what I should be. Until You. You came into my life. When I was all alone. You came down. And saved my soul
english.segment2: Chorus: When I found my world was crashing. And I thought I'd lost my passion. You came and laid a hand. On this little girl
english.segment3: When I thought my dreams were fading. I looked up and saw You waiting. You reached Your hand down. And You made my world. I never thought of where I might be. If I turned away from You. I never thought of all I would need
english.segment4: Without You. You came down. When I was all alone. You came down. You came down. And saved my soul
